crisis.title: ⚠️ Hypertensive Crisis
crisis.subtitle: Your reading of {{systolic}}/{{diastolic}} mmHg significantly exceeds normal limits.
crisis.symptomsQuestion: Are you experiencing any of these symptoms?

emergency.title: CALL 911 / EMERGENCY SERVICES
emergency.message: You reported symptoms that may indicate a medical emergency. Call emergency services immediately.

urgency.title: Contact Your Provider
urgency.message: No symptoms reported. Contact your healthcare provider immediately for same-day evaluation. Do not wait for a scheduled appointment.

crisis.disclaimer: This app is not a medical device. This is an automated warning based on published medical guidelines and does not constitute medical advice.

derivedMetrics.disclaimer: This information is for educational purposes only. Always consult your healthcare provider for medical interpretation of your blood pressure readings.

pp.title: Pulse Pressure (PP)
pp.definition: The difference between systolic and diastolic blood pressure.
pp.significance: High pulse pressure (>60 mmHg) may indicate arterial stiffness and increased cardiovascular risk. Consult your healthcare provider if consistently elevated.

map.title: Mean Arterial Pressure (MAP)
map.definition: The average arterial pressure during a single cardiac cycle.
map.significance: MAP indicates organ perfusion pressure. Values below 60 mmHg may compromise organ function. Values above 100 mmHg indicate hypertension.
